subject: Order #SSN4634 Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter
description_text:
Hello, I ordered a Simsonn HS Pro Shifter, H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation
Shifter, on December 10, 2025, through your website. I am still waiting, and
there is no information on the website. This product is available for pre-
order. Deliveries will begin on December 19, but I have not received any 
notification by email, nor has anyone contacted me. I have paid for
everything.

conversations.body_text: Hi 5nono5,      Latest production update: The HS Pro shifter will be shipped on December 29. The schedule was slightly delayed due to issues with components before shipment.
